algorithm_technique: Find the maximum element in the array. Then, find the longest contiguous subarray consisting only of this maximum element.
problem_summary_simple: Find the longest subarray whose bitwise AND equals the maximum possible bitwise AND of any subarray.
problem_summary_technical: The maximum bitwise AND is simply the maximum element. Find the longest contiguous subarray of this maximum element.
key_insights: The maximum bitwise AND of any subarray cannot exceed the maximum element in the array.
If a subarray contains only the maximum element, its bitwise AND will be that maximum element.
Therefore, the problem simplifies to finding the longest contiguous subarray of the maximum element.
